technical_parameters.name: temperature
technical_parameters.description: Controls the randomness/creativity of the output. Higher values produce more varied results.

technical_parameters.name: guidance
technical_parameters.description: Controls how closely the model follows your prompt. Higher values adhere more closely.

technical_parameters.name: seed
technical_parameters.description: Sets a specific random seed for deterministic generation. Same seed + same parameters = same result.

technical_parameters.name: length
technical_parameters.description: Controls the length of the generated track in seconds.

technical_parameters.name: key_signature
technical_parameters.values: C, C#, D, D#, E, F, F#, G, G#, A, A#, B (with major/minor)

technical_parameters.name: tempo
technical_parameters.description: Beats per minute - controls the speed of the track.

additional_parameters.name: style_reference
additional_parameters.description: A reference song or artist to influence the style and sound of the generation.
additional_parameters.values: String with artist name and song title

additional_parameters.name: diversity
additional_parameters.description: Controls the diversity of the output. Higher values lead to more diverse results.

additional_parameters.name: energy
additional_parameters.description: Controls the energy level of the track. Higher values create more intense, dynamic pieces.
